interactivity.requirements: 25 Sara Lust 25 Haruka Lust You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Engulfed " from Sara Sakakibara
interactivity.to_get_this_event: See Engulfed and have 25+ Sara and Haruka Lust before starting the event chain. Autoplays after " Midnight Mom Mosh " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " A Walk Through Hell " .
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Miss seeing Engulfed or have less than 25 Sara or Haruka Lust before A Walk Through Hell . Replaced by Fatal Misfire

choices.effect:
+1 First Floor, 
    +1 Sara Affection,
    +1 Sara Lust

+1 Second Floor,
    +1 Haruka Affection,
    +1 Haruka Lust

progression.synopsis: Sensei arrives at the hotel to find that he and Imani will be sharing a room. As the two step open their room, they find Haruka and Sara already inside, having been waiting for Sensei to show up. Imani wishes him good luck before taking her leave.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .27.0.
